ygData.subject: The ship issue
ygData.msgSnippet: I think that crafts with limited defenses should be allowed as long as they re not abused. Phobias former ship would be a good example, it was designed to hold

From: "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@...>

I think that crafts with limited defenses should be allowed as long as
they're not abused. Phobias former ship would be a good example, it was
designed to hold up to 5 bots comfortably but had room for more. It had
shielding that could be knocked out by a series of missles. (Nobody tried to
destroy it until the preds tried thier dramatic escape. Mini slipped a bot
into the ship when  I wasn't paying attention to the posts. It had forward
guns that had to take time to recharge after firing depending on the force
of the blast. (An easy target from all sides except the front. I set the
limitations within reason, I feal that other ships should be allowed
depending on limitations. All ships can be destroyed if the right weapon is
used.

Phobias ship was allowed for months until it was destroyed, other ships
should be allowed too.


----- Original Message -----
From: <Yanshosh@...>
To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
Sent: Monday, November 20, 2000 4:28 PM
Subject: Re: MeowMix


> Allright, three men it is. And I formed up an official sounding rule
> (a variation of the original):
>
> Since there have been no mobile bases in the Beast Wars, and also
> since mobile bases give an unfair tactical advantage (and often lead
> to moding), mobile bases (any mobile craft other than a transport
> pod, one-person transport ship, or something to that extent is
> considered a base and is subject to this rule) are not allowed.
> Allowed vehicles are small (up to three bot) transports, with no
> onboard weapons, shields, or CR chambers. If you arrive on the planet
> in a ship not abiding to these rules, it must be grounded where it
> lands, and may not be moved.
>
>
> How does that sound? Unless there are a bunch of objections, it'll
> end up on the new site.
>
>
>
> --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, JP3884@a... wrote:
> > OOC: Because my sub idea was already rolling before this whole
> three bot deal
> > took place, im still going to be using it for my design...but I
> will only
> > place three bots in it.
>
>
>
>
>
